summary: Comprehensive frontend testing completed for dragon-themed Lucky Wheel website. All three main features working correctly: dragon SVG decorations, removed admin link, and win rate sliders with visual overview.
passed_tests: Main page loads without admin link visible
Dragon SVG decorations render and animate around wheel
Admin page accessible via direct /admin URL
Win Rate Overview bar displays colored segments proportionally
Win rate sliders present for all prizes
Slider adjustments update percentage displays in real-time
Save button works with success toast confirmation
Complete spin flow functional (generate code → spin → win modal)
Win rate percentages correctly sum to ~100%
